text: "Chained to the Wheel" is a 1989 song by Australian band The Black Sorrows and is the third single from their fifth studio album Hold On to Me. It went to number 9 in Australia and number 42 in New Zealand. ==Track listing== ;7" single (CBS 654548 7) # "Chained to the Wheel" – 3:57 # "Waiting for the Rain" – 5:02 ==References== Category:1989 songs Category:Blues rock songs Category:The Black Sorrows songs Category:John Denver songs
title: Chained to the Wheel
